subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में कौन सा प्रमुख कठ है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is a famous fort in Jodhpur, but the correct answer is Bheem Fort. Kheerola Fort is located in Bikaner, Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मेरणगरवाल है जो जोधपुर में है। सचिवाल कहाँ है, राजस्थान में है।
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Bikaner, Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में किस्मती देश क्या है?
subject: Rajasthan History
